items.sentence: I'd scream very loudly if I saw a scorpion in my room.
I grabbed my little sister's hand and started running.
I wish that Tom would get struck by lightning and die.
You don't need to eat anything that you don't want to.
The only question is whether or not we should do that.
I have a lot of things that I want to do before I die.
The category of a hurricane depends on its wind speed.
Do you think that Tom would care if we didn't do that?
Do you think that Tom would mind if we didn't do that?
I think that it was Tom that I saw getting on the bus.
